articles.title: Judge - Lawyers for Brian Flores, others can't gather more evidence before decision on whether lawsuit will be sent to arbitration
articles.description: A judge ruled that lawyers for coaches Brian Flores, Steve Wilks and Ray Horton cannot gather additional evidence to support their arguments that the lawsuit alleging racial discrimination should remain in court rather than be sent to arbitration.

articles.description: Major League Baseball is planning to return to London next season with the Cubs and Cardinals squaring off in a two-game series in June of 2023, the league announced on Thursday.

articles.title: Brittney Griner sentenced to nine years in Russian prison
articles.description: Brittney Griner has been found guilty of drug possession and smuggling and was sentenced to nine years in a Russian prison, an expected conclusion to her trial that should allow negotiations for a prisoner swap to accelerate.
